Title: Camp Rock
Writer: Karin Gist, Regina Y. Hicks, Julie Brown, Paul Brown
Actors: Demi Lovato, Joe Jonas, Meaghan Martin, Maria Canals-Barrera
Plot: "Camp Rock" centers on a teen girl who desperately wants to spend her summer at a prestigious rock camp but can only attend if she works in the kitchen as one of its cooks. When she's overheard singing (but not seen) by a teen pop star at the camp, he is completely taken and sets out to find the girl behind the beautiful voice. But first she must confront her fears, step out of the kitchen and into the spotlight.
